message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! However, I still need to make a bit more profit. I'll offer you the product for $122. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
